name: Devilish Recruits
description:
"Devilish Recruits" is a cutesy 3D shooting game where you play as Lucifer the Prince of Darkness, who's on a quest to invade heaven and form an army against god.

Use the gun to shoot as many angels as possible to turn them into devils, but do it quick since you're under a time limit!

--

Final project made for Code Coven's Intro to game making course, coven of spring equinox 2021

Game made by:

Sheyla: https://sheylavperez.itch.io/

Snaily: https://snailygames.itch.io/

Music provided by freemusicarchive.org, made by various artists such as:

* Crowander

* DeeYan-key

* Ketsa

* Scott Holmes Music
